text: Quentin Fillon Maillet (born 16 August 1992) is a French biathlete. He competed in the 2014/15 world cup season, and represented France at the Biathlon World Championships 2015 in Kontiolahti. ==Biathlon results== All results are sourced from the International Biathlon Union. ===Olympic Games=== 0 medals {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !width="28%"|Event !width="12%"|Individual !width="12%"|Sprint !width="12%"|Pursuit !width="12%"|Mass start !width="12%"|Relay !width="12%"|Mixed relay |- | align=left | 2018 Pyeongchang | — | 48th | 44th | 29th | — | — |} ===World Championships=== 9 medals (2 gold, 4 silver, 3 bronze) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !style="width:200px;"|Event !style="width:70px;"|Individual !style="width:70px;"|Sprint !style="width:70px;"|Pursuit !style="width:70px;"|Mass start !style="width:70px;"|Relay !style="width:70px;"|Mixed relay !style="width:70px;"|Single mixed relay |- | align=left | 2015 Kontiolahti | 79th | 38th | 46th | — | style="background:#cfaa88;"| Bronze | — | rowspan="3" |- | align=left | 2016 Oslo Holmenkollen |19th |16th |10th |20th |9th | style="background:gold;"| Gold |- | align=left | 2017 Hochfilzen | 17th | 43rd | 22nd | 15th | style="background:silver;"| Silver | style="background:silver;"| Silver |- | align=left | 2019 Östersund | 12th | style="background:#cfaa88;"| Bronze | style="background:#cfaa88;"| Bronze | 5th | 6th | — | — |- | align=left | 2020 Antholz-Anterselva | 7th | style="background:silver;"| Silver | 7th | style="background:silver;"| Silver | style="background:gold;"| Gold | 7th | — |} :*The single mixed relay was added as an event in 2019. ===Biathlon World Cup=== ;World Cup rankings {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" width="70%" |- class="hintergrundfarbe5" !
